name: django-showroom
description: Django-native Showroom for building design systems with multi-framework adapters and shared recipe CSS

scripts.build:showroom:bundle: npx esbuild static/js/showroomReact.js --bundle --minify --outfile=static/js/showroomReact.bundle.js && npx esbuild static/js/core.js --bundle --minify --outfile=static/js/core.bundle.js
scripts.build:showroom: npm run build:showroom:registry && npm run build:showroom:bundle
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:ds-icons && npm run build:showroom
